name: dinhero
description: Dinhero - Seu controle financeiro na palma da mÃ£o

scripts.build:ios: set -o pipefail && xcodebuild -workspace ios/dinhero.xcworkspace -scheme dinhero -configuration ReleaseProduction -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO | xcpretty

scripts.build:ios:productionRelease: set -o pipefail && xcodebuild -workspace ios/dinhero.xcworkspace -scheme dinhero -configuration ReleaseProduction -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build CODE_SIGNING_ALLOWED=NO CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO | xcpretty
